title: SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL_NO_DROP
content:
0x340E61DE7F4715650xED6F44F5// SetPlayerWantedLevelNoDrop
void SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL_NO_DROP(Player player, int wantedLevel, BOOL delayedResponse);Parameters:player: the target playerwantedLevel: the wanted level 1-5delayedResponse: false = 0-10sec police spawn response time, true = 10-20sec police spawn response timeExamples:Lualocal player = PlayerId()
SetPlayerWantedLevelNoDrop(player, 5, false) -- 5 star wanted level
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerWantedLevelNoDrop
void SET_PLAYER_WANTED_LEVEL_NO_DROP(Player player, int wantedLevel, BOOL delayedResponse);

local player = PlayerId()
SetPlayerWantedLevelNoDrop(player, 5, false) -- 5 star wanted level
